text: SI PASTA at 399 Taman Jurong Koufu is a hidden gem! Easily the best pasta I've had in Taman Jurong. Their Aglio Olio is amazing‚Äîperfectly cooked pasta with just the right balance of garlic, spice, and fragrance. The flavors are rich, and you can taste the quality ingredients. The flavors are rich, and you can taste the quality ingredients. I also tried their cheese fries, and they were delicious. Highly recommended for all pasta lovers!

This is the first time we tried Si Pasta.

We ordered smoked duck pasta, mixed veg pasta and steak (Medium).

All dishes exceeded our expectations. Very polite and friendly service from the lady who took our orders.

We saw many customers patronized Si Pasta, definitely a good and healthy sign that Si Pasta is doing a good job. Keep it up Si Pasta.

Unfortunately, the atmosphere was not that good due to the flies at Koufu. Hopefully, Koufu and all the stalls will step up the cleanliness of the place so that customers will have a more enjoyable dining experience.

Si Pasta is the best neighbourhood pasta I have eaten by far! Food tastes good, prices are reasonable and portions are big. I've been eating here at least once a week, so glad that they're in Taman Jurong. Staff are very friendly and accommodating.
Looks good and taste good. Love that there are vegetarian options. Not crowded at Koufu even during lunch hours so good to enjoy the aircon while enjoying good food.
